responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "3D31B1124E710E4B70CA1E94A9FB5FFB", "After much searching, you find a record for orders pertaining to the Citadel of Steel Bloom. They are post-Harbinger Apocalypse and appear to refer to the binding of supernatural entities using locally mined Sephillite from Megalithic stone.")
name: MADD_0007_TSS_GemcutterArchive_6
